info.description: Farmers Module Service with Workflow-Based Architecture for Farm Management
info.title: Farmers Module API

get.description: Retrieve the audit trail for system activities
Check the health status of the service

post.description: Check if a user has permission to perform a specific action
Initialize the system with default roles and permissions

get.description: Retrieve a list of all farm activities

post.description: Create a new farm activity for a crop cycle

get.description: Retrieve a specific farm activity by its ID

put.description: Update an existing farm activity details

post.description: Mark a farm activity as completed

get.description: Retrieve a list of all crop cycles

post.description: Start a new crop cycle for a specific farm

get.description: Retrieve a specific crop cycle by its ID

put.description: Update an existing crop cycle details

post.description: End an active crop cycle with status and outcome

get.description: Retrieve a list of all farms with optional filtering

post.description: Create a new farm with geographic boundaries and metadata

get.description: Retrieve a specific farm by its ID

put.description: Update farm details including name, geometry, and location

post.description: Creates a new FPO organization with CEO user setup and user groups

get.description: Retrieves FPO reference information by AAA organization ID

post.description: Registers an existing FPO organization for local reference management

get.description: List farmers with filtering and pagination
Retrieve a farmer profile by AAA user ID and org ID

post.description: Link a farmer to a Farmer Producer Organization with AAA validation

get.description: Retrieve the linkage status between a farmer and FPO

post.description: Unlink a farmer from a Farmer Producer Organization with soft delete
Assign a KisanSathi user to a specific farmer

get.description: Retrieve the KisanSathi assignment for a specific farmer

post.description: Create a new KisanSathi user with role assignment

put.description: Reassign a KisanSathi to a different farmer or remove the assignment

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
